properties.name: jda.token
properties.description: Token used to authenticate the bot.

properties.name: ssl.keystore_path
properties.description: Path to keystore used in SSL socket connection.

properties.name: ssl.keystore_password
properties.description: Password used to access keystore file content.

properties.name: client.username
properties.description: Username used to connect to the bot with a client app.

properties.name: client.password
properties.description: Password used to connect to the bot with a client app.
